titleStmt.title: 60 Topics with 50 most probable words and their probability values

sourceDesc.bibl: Neuber, Frederike and Ulrike Henny-Krahmer. 2022. “Topic modeling the correspondence of Jean Paul’s surroundings” (v.1.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/#####, GitHub: https://github.com/FrederikeNeuber/jeanpaul-topics.

taxonomy.desc: Topic model of the correspondence of the surroundings of Jean Paul (1156 letters), based on the edited texts with normalized ortography and prepared with Mallet (mallet-2.0.8RC3, LDA) with the following parameters: 60 topics, 5000 iterations, hyperparameter optimization interval of 100, 50 top words per topic.
